questions.question: Why should you update your anti-virus software regularly?

choices.answer: To keep it from being infected by viruses
To help out the software companies
To protect your computer against new viruses
To gain access to new websites

questions.question: What do computer viruses have in common with biological viruses?

choices.answer: They're made of proteins
They're microscopic
They can infect both humans and animals
They make copies of themselves

questions.question: Which of these scenes expresses a common way in which computer viruses are spread?

choices.answer: A
B
C
D

questions.question: How is a benign computer virus different from other viruses?

choices.answer: Benign viruses cause system crashes; other viruses don't
Benign viruses infect pc's via email or through shared CDs
Benign viruses can't replicate themselves; other viruses can
Benign viruses just replicate; other viruses harm your PC

questions.question: Why is it so easy to get tricked by Trojan horses?

choices.answer: They appear to be emails from your friends
They're hidden inside what seems like cool or useful soft.
You can't tell when one has infected your computer
They replicate quickly

questions.question: Viruses, Trojan horses are called â€œmalware. What can you conclude about the prefix mal?

choices.answer: It refers to things that are bad or undesirable
It refers to specific types of software
It refers to biological viruses and bacteria
It refers to things that can replicate

questions.question: Why are schools and businesses especially vulnerable to worms?

choices.answer: Their employees and students aren't computer literate
They own too many computers
They have large file-sharing networks
Directors & bosses prefer pc's communication to phone

questions.question: Which of the following is an opinion about the people who create computer viruses?

choices.answer: Their creations can cause millions of dollars in damages
They're usually skilled at computer programming
Most of them are extremely mean
If they distribute viruses, they can face criminal charges

questions.question: f you receive an email attachment from someone you don't know, what should you do?

choices.answer: Write the person back and ask if it's a virus
Forward it to a friend before you open it
Open it to make sure it's not a virus
Delete it immediately

questions.question: Why would an email virus mail itself to everyone in your address book?

choices.answer: So it can infect as many computers as possible
So you can alert your friends that you've got a virus
So it can never be detected by anti-virus software
So it can mutate into new viruses
